Plot: James Bond uncovers a nuclear plot when he protects an oil heiress from her former kidnapper, an international terrorist who can't feel pain.
Title: The World Is Not Enough
Writer: Neal Purvis (story), Robert Wade (story), Neal Purvis (screenplay), Robert Wade (screenplay), Bruce Feirstein (screenplay)
Actors: Pierce Brosnan, Sophie Marceau, Robert Carlyle, Denise Richards
tomatoConsensus: Plagued by mediocre writing, uneven acting, and a fairly by-the-numbers plot, The World Is Not Enough is partially saved by some entertaining and truly Bond-worthy action sequences.
